physics_fixture_set_edge_shape: This function defines an "edge" fixture shape. An edge shape is simply a line that will generate a collision when other fixtures over lap it, and can be very useful for generating (for example) terrain, or for creating borders around a room. The position of the edge is defined using local space, ie: the x/y position of the instance is considered (0,0), so this should be taken into consideration when creating them (in the code example below, the instance would have been placed at (0,0) in the room to avoid complications).
